title: Sunsure Energy inks Rs 10,000-cr loan pact with REC to develop green energy projects
description: Sunsure Energy has signed an agreement with REC Ltd for a Rs 10,000 crore loan to develop green energy projects. The partnership aims to support the development of 3 GW of solar, wind, hybrid, and BESS projects in India. These projects are expected to offset 5 million tonnes of carbon dioxide annually.
